Package org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry

This package contains the classes related to maintaining the persistence of the Tickets for retrieval later by the Central Authentication Service.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RegistryCleaner Deprecated
    As of 4.2.
    TicketRegistry
    Interface for a registry that stores tickets.
    TicketRegistryState
    Describes important state information that may be optionally exposed by TicketRegistry components that might be of interest to monitors.
    TicketRegistrySupport
    Helper strategy API to ease retrieving CAS' Authentication object and its associated components from available CAS SSO String token called Ticket Granting Ticket (TGT).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDistributedTicketRegistry
    Abstract Implementation that handles some of the commonalities between distributed ticket registries.
    AbstractTicketDelegator<T extends Ticket>
    This is AbstractTicketDelegator.
    AbstractTicketRegistry  
    CouchbaseTicketRegistry
    A Ticket Registry storage backend which uses the memcached protocol.
    DefaultTicketRegistry
    Implementation of the TicketRegistry that is backed by a ConcurrentHashMap.
    DefaultTicketRegistrySupport
    This is DefaultTicketRegistrySupport.
    EhCacheTicketRegistry
    Ehcache based distributed ticket registry.
    HazelcastTicketRegistry
    Hazelcast-based implementation of a TicketRegistry.
    IgniteTicketRegistry
    Ignite based distributed ticket registry.
    InfinispanTicketRegistry
    This is InfinispanTicketRegistry.
    JpaTicketRegistry
    JPA implementation of a CAS TicketRegistry.
    MemCacheTicketRegistry
    Key-value ticket registry implementation that stores tickets in memcached keyed on the ticket ID.
    ProxyGrantingTicketDelegator
    This provides a wrapper for ProxyGrantingTicket so they can transparently reference the TicketRegistry they were loaded from.
    ProxyTicketDelegator
    This provides a wrapper for ProxyTicket so they can transparently reference the TicketRegistry they were loaded from.
    ServiceTicketDelegator<T extends ServiceTicket>
    This is ServiceTicketDelegator.
    TicketGrantingTicketDelegator<T extends TicketGrantingTicket>
    This is TicketGrantingTicketDelegator.

Package org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry Description

This package contains the classes related to maintaining the persistence of the Tickets for retrieval later by the Central Authentication Service.

Since:
3.0
